title: Viewing point
review: Viewing point for Himalaya range . Snow peaks are visible on a clear day . Small restaurant serving tea coffee and snacks at reasonable prices

title: Good view
review: Perfect place for nature lovers and photography.beautiful view of valley and snow mountains.nothing much to do in this place...its a place to spend some quiet and peaceful time amidst nature.

title: Just wow
review: You get to see a picture perfect view from top, beautiful hills and I was lucky to see himaliyan ranges.

title: Great point in Lansdowne
review: You can actually see the snow clad mountains in the long background and clear skies from this highest point in Lansdowne. They also have a cafe at this place to enjoy hot pipping coffee.

title: Scenic and Natural
review: Tip in Top Point is place where you can click the Photography and feel the chill of snow cladding mountains.

title: Place to view some Panoramic Hills
review: A perfect view-point to check out the spread out hills, and snow capped mountain peaks. This place is surrounded by pine & oak trees. St. Mary's Church is also at close proximity to this place.

title: Best point of Lansdowne
review: One of the better places in Lansdowne to stay and enjoy the view of the Himalayan ranges. We directly drove up the city center to this point. There are a couple of restaurants and places to stay here.

title: Good view from the tip-in-top point
review: Not many attractions are there in Lansdowne. This is one of the few tourist point in Lansdowne. Overall good to visit for 1-2 hour and possibly during evening time (sunset) or early morning during sunrise.

title: Good View
review: It is primarily a view point next to GMVN rest house of Lansdown. Has some cafe s around. A good place to sit and chit chat. The View is of course good. The place was bit crowded by a large group hence really could not make much of the place.

title: Most popular tourist point
review: Stunning views can be captured from here, a perfect point click images, one can enjoy snacks etc from nearby shop

title: Awesome View of Valley
review: Its on good height and one can enjoy awesome view of whole valley. Heaven for Nature Lovers but nothing else to do there.

title: Mesmerizing views
review: Do visit on a clear sunny day to have the best views of mountain ranges, even if its a bit of rain and sun you can see Rainbows from this place.

title: Hill top
review: The place offers a beautiful mountain view. I didn't witness any sunset. I tried to look where the sun was setting but couldn't find it. There is no entry fee for this place. There is ample parking space. There are also a few eateries for some snacks. Sadly, people have disfigured the place with marks all over the place. Nothing much to see. Do carry a jacket as it gets chilly in the evening.

title: Top Hill
review: Its a simple viewpoint place. A good place for getting pictures clicked. apart from that nothing extraordinary to see. Lush green trees and adjoining to the lake.

title: Must visit point in Lansdowne
review: This place offers a breathtaking view of the Himalayas, provided you are lucky and it's a clear day.

title: Fairly Average with a panoramic view of the hills
review: Tip in Top Point is fairly average place to visit, if you haven't seen the panoramic view of hills then do go.

title: Nice view
review: Nothing much to do but there is nice view to the valley. Driving to reach Tip in Top was very watchful

title: Skip it
review: Not sure why people claim that the best views around are from this point. The resort where we stayed had a much better view!!

title: Peaceful place with a breathtaking view
review: Only a hilltop which gives you a wonderful view of the valley . If you love peace and tranquility , you can meditate here without getting disturbed . We loved the beautiful environment .

title: Nuce view
review: Very peaceful and calm place. No visited by many tourist. Good for meditation. View during set set and sun rise in awesome .

title: one word only beauty
review: I am staying at GMVN and this is place is hardly 5mins far from my room the beauty of this place mesmerized you, the chilled fresh air silent place will keep your mind& soul fresh , calm.

title: The must see view of Lansdowne
review: This is the highest point in Lansdowne, I had seen different landscapes during my stay in Lansdowne, but this one was the best I must say. Some people say, across this point you will be able to see Himalaya range, but fortunately & unfortunately it was very cloudy when I was there. Also you have got good places to sit and hang around there.

title: Good view.
review: Take your bird books and binocs. Forest below is teeming with birdlife. Better to visit early morning or early evening when there is less glare. If it is a cloudy day then you won’t see the view.

title: Must visit
review: We thought it to be a normal hill station view point so kept it for last minute visit. But the place is amazing, offering breath taking view, too windy. You would love to visit it again n again.

title: Beautiful view
review: This place is beautiful with amazing views , it was raining when we were there so very people were there which gave us space and time to explore the place , there is a small cafe here which would serve hot Maggi and tea

title: Nice Place.
review: Lansdown is a very peaceful place so dont expect much crowds.  It has a very panoramic view of the valley from this point.  Very neat and clean place with a good restaurant with very reasonably prices.

title: Feeling High
review: This is highest point here. Very fresh but strong winds can make you feel elated. Good place to be and take zooming pictures of the panoramic scenary

title: Amazing View Point - Must Visit
review: This is the highest place in the lansdowne and easily accessible from city center.

title: Lovely views
review: Beautiful views. There is a cafe where you can chill and hang out. Worth a visit. Must do in Lansdowne.

title: A Bird Eye View of Lansdowne Scenic Beauty.
review: 1. It is one of the highest point in Lansdowne, hence from here we get complete bird eye view of whole Lansdowne natural scenic beauty.

title: An Average place to be at.
review: extremely over rated place to be at specially in the month of June atleast. Extremely crowded and hot place.

title: Good view
review: The view is good, though it is not suggested to be visited during summer time. This is because the mountains are not as green. Also due to certain forest fires recently, the area has been full of haze, thus not giving a full view from this Point.

title: Good view.
review: Take your bird books and binocs. Forest below is teeming with birdlife. Better to visit early morning or early evening.

title: Highest point of Lansdowne
review: It's highest point of Lansdowne.

title: Windy tip in top
review: Probably the highest point at Lansdowne. Road is reasonably good and one can easily self drive to reach there. Sufficient parking place is available rate 20rs/hour. After parking the car just ride 25 steps to reach highest point from where breath taking views of Himalayan mountain range is visible. In a sunny day it is really enjoyable. Coffee and snacks are also available in adjacent restaurant. Lunch is also available in reasonable price. Must see view point at Lansdowne.

title: Beautiful
review: My first visit to north india and i found this place very nice . Beautiful view of hills and green mountains which is lacking in mumbai

title: Spectacular views
review: In otherwise bad stay at GMVN TRH deluxe huts, we visited here twice and both times views and weather is outstanding.

title: Good place to see deep valley and sun rise
review: We were staying just above this point in GMVN guest house, so saw this 50 times during our stay but never felt bored as every time it had something new to offer. Nearby a restaurant in main gate next to parking serves you good tea.

title: Best place in Lansdowne.
review: Tip N Top point is the highest place in Lansdowne where we can see amazing view of mighty Himalayas. There is a government owned GMVN hotel at this place where one can pre-book and stay.Best time to visit here is in the evening during sunset. A photogenic place where you can never stop clicking photos.

title: Very Quiet and nice place Blue Pine Resorts in Lansdowne
review: I also went to Tip-in-Top Point during my visit to Lansdowne end of March along with family.  Also enjoyed delicious food at Blue Pine Restaurant at TiTP.  They offered mouth watering dishes. Only drawback is Monkeys are freely roaming around. We were really afraid of them.

title: The view from place is dependent on time of visit
review: the place is good in monsoons probably as you will see greenery everywhere. but I went in summers and it wasnt so good as the mountains were mostly barren.

title: A simple view point in Lansdowne.
review: It is a  simple view point in Lansdowne. The view is good but no other activities to do like garden, binocular view or big area for view.

title: GOOD PLACE TO SEE CITY
review: It's a good point if you wish to see a certain section of the city plus the scenic beauty. It is not a very large area but you can easily see clouds dancing through mountains as well as click some photos of the place. There is also a small cafeteria which sells local foodstuff including samosa and tea/coffee.  There is heavy fine on throwing wrappers or papers. There are dustbins to throw the trash.

title: Nice view.
review: From this view point you can see some amazing views of the Himalayan mountain range. Make sure you visit this place when you are in Lansdowne.

title: Nice place to have a look on Himalayan range.
review: One can see the Himalayan range from this place, provided weather is clear. One has to reach this place before sunrise to enjoy the majestic view of Himalayan mountains. The visibility of Himalayan peaks is at its best in winters. One can see number of peaks like Nanda Devi, Nanda kot,  Chaukhamba, Trishul, Kamet etc

title: In between the valley
review: Astonishing valley with magnificent view.

title: Cliche Lovers' spot/ Suicide point.
review: It is just another over hyped "Highest point of the hill station which provides the complete view of the valley" point.

title: Views...landscape
review: I went last year with friends and it was great experience. Relaxing place, peaceful, especially the mountain views were amazing.

title: Fabulous view
review: The Tip N Top Point is the topmost point in the Lansdowne and it gives a wonderful view of the Garhwal valley. Don't miss if you visit Lansdowne.

title: Mesmerizing View
review: The view from Tip-in-Top point is amazing. There is nothing much to do at this point except from view point and a snack bar.

title: This is the best place for a beautiful sunset
review: There is honestly not much to do in Lansdowne. You can drive to Tip n Top point but I will highly recommend that you walk to this point because the path is beautiful! It will take you 15-20 min to reach here.

title: Mesmerizing sunrise and sunset
review: Sunset and sunrise are best viewed from this point. Tip-n-top cafe is also nearby so one can have refreshments at this place. The Himalayas view is spectacular from this point and a must visit place once you are in Lansdowne

title: Tip of a low hill
review: The top is at approximately 7000 feet. Though it gives a good view of lower Himalaya ranges, the place isn’t really very exciting.

title: One of the best breakfast and retreat point
review: Tip in top is a cliff top where you can take a panaromic view of landsdowne, amazing view from that point, also you can have tummyful breakfast in various cafes over at that point.

title: Nothing spectacular
review: It is the highest point in Lansdowne. There is a cafe where you can have snacks.

title: Great View
review: Good place to visit if you want to see full view of valley. Must be good during snow season. The place had good coffee and snacks centre and you can relax.

title: Average place
review: It's a small place in Lansdowne to view sunset but trees obstruct the view.Its one of very few place of attraction.

title: Highest View point in Lansdowne
review: Tip-in-Top Point is the highest view point of lansdowne. it gives a beautiful view of the valley and also have restaurants for a quick bite.

title: Awesome View
review: The tip-in-top point in lansdowne is a bit secluded, you won't find much of a crowd, and thats its USP, you can find peace in here, the only setback is that there are not much good eateries around

title: Nice place to relax
review: I have seen many Tip-in-Top points but lansdowne is most peaceful location. If climate is clear, you can see the long Himalayan range and lush green valleys.You can also enjoy food in Garhwal Mandal Hotel in Tip-in-Top.

title: Specatular view
review: Lansdowne has several such views, not one particular is beautiful, they all are spectacular! This one has a seating option, thus the most famous one.

title: Scenic beauty at its best!
review: It was my 6th or 7th visit to Lansdowne. As on date, it os not the same as it was earlier in 2008. The greenery has reduced and the old bungalow has been transformed into a modern day resort. The Tree house at the area still remains my all time favourite.

title: Great Sunrise point
review: We went to see the sunrise and it offered a view of the whole valley. Tea and other facilities were also available. Its a good attraction for travelers.

title: Not for people scared of heights
review: This place is at the top of the mountains and gives you the view of the whole valley beneath you. If you are scared of heights I would strongly suggest you to keep away from this.

title: Valley view from the top..
review: I have been there for around 3-4 times..The place is around 2-3 km from the main town..you need to park ur vehicle around 600 mtrs and walk to see the panoramic view..snacks and other facilities are available at the point..Enjoy...

title: View View - Marvellous view
review: Visited on 28.01.18

title: Nothing special
review: There is nothing special here and a person can come to see the sunrise. This has a good valley view which one can find from hotel or other places as well.

title: Good scenic view
review: People say this is best point in lANSDOWNE but i disagree, Its average place for watching mountains but classic place for watching sunrise. If you are in lansdowne, just travel to this place early morning to watch SUN RISE.

title: Quite place with a view of the ranges on any sunny day
review: Upon reaching the site, welcomed by an amazing view of the valley, distant ranges, and at the back ground the majestic Himalayan ranges (180 degree view). Sit there for hours and enjoy the scenery unfolding before your eyes....an experience that you will never forget!

title: Beautiful View
review: Its kind of on TOP of Lansdowne. The Views from here are incredible. Snow laden Himalayan peaks views are awesome.

title: Snowy Peaks
review: Viewpoint with Himalayan views. Popular but with a fair amount of litter. Needs to be a clear day to see anything much.

title: Nice view of Lansdowne
review: Since there is not much to do in Lansdowne, you can consider visiting this place for good pictures to take and for a nice view. there is a small cafe here as well that serves snacks.

title: A beautiful view point
review: At hill top this place gives a picturesque scene. Whole valley is visible from the point. A wonderful scene. Another experience is that my Reliance Jio net was non functional right from the time I reached Lansdowne but it was functional at this point.

title: Scenic
review: You could go by your vehicle to the point but we preferred a trek. A good view of the valley below. Spend some time around, visit the St Mary church and spend some time at the cafe. Yes, there is a cafe at the top. There is a trek route right from Bhulla lake so you can combine the two.

title: Better if you walk to the point
review: Nothing great, but the walking route to the point is quite good.It's, of course, a steep climb but worth it.

title: Very disappointing
review: We heard about this place as sunset point but very disappointed to find that the sun sets exactly the opposite direction

title: Beautiful
review: Place is around 3 km from Lansdowne.gives beautiful views of snow clad Himalayas.Has a restaurant and cottages for stay as well. The washroom needs marked improvement. Vegetable maggi is good.

title: Top of the hill, that's all
review: This provides top of the hill view and you can see nearby hills n places from here. Nothing much to do here apart from staring at nearby hills. We went there and stayed for 10-15 mins only.

title: Nice panoramic view ..
review: It is situated at quite a height and hence the view is great. gives a great view of the snow clad mountains when the weather is clear. May be a disappointment when the conditions are cloudy. Hence, check before you go.

title: Tip in top
review: Norhing my room at kasang regency couldnt offer! View was just fine. Me and whole of the family found it to be a waste if time. Lansdowne is a place to Walk, drive, sink in the mountains in You! Nothing else :)

title: A point with a very beautiful view
review: Tip & Top point is located around 3-4 kms away from Lansdowne market. It is a small point with round shape which gives 360 degree views of mountains. View from the point is very beautiful. One can sit and enjoy the views around. A small restaurant is also located at the point & a Garhwal Mandal.hotel is also there.

title: Valley View Point from TOP
review: its a point from where you see an amazing view of mountains, if the sky is clear you will be able to see Himalayas, its like any other tourist tiffin top point at a hill top.

title: Great scenic view.
review: The view is really nice. And you can really enjoy the chill in the air from mid october ownwards.

title: Great view
review: Visited this place in the evening, valley view is beautiful,it appears like other hill stations where you invariably find some view point...But you can enjoy some moments of respite here

title: Perfect place
review: Perfect place if u want to enjoy Himalaya views... place is clean and location is amazing.... Nice destination

title: crowded and not such a grand view
review: it was just an okay place, not much of a view to take your breath away. there was a small outlet for snacks and tea and it felt that people were more interested in refreshments than the view

title: Lansdowne diaries
review: A marvellous destination, build by britishers ,a perfect blend of peace and nature.love with the place ,specially tip n top.river on the way specially.

title: Usual highest peak in area stuff
review: It's just a usual stuff in all tourist hills. Highest peak in area with a view point...

title: Romantic Evening Place with Lovely Picturesque views.
review: An evening in Paris of Uttrakhand.. Amazing view if clear sky.. Enjoy Cool Breeze with a glass of Wine.. Just Enjoy the place..

title: Best point in lansdowne
review: Lansdowne as such is a quite hill station with not so many place to visit but this place is certainly best. You get a real good views of the mountain range from there. you can spend about 30-40 minutes over here

title: Beautiful view of the place from TIP in TOP point
review: This place offer the spectacular view of the Himalayas. Amazing location with clean and green view of the beautiful surroundings.This place has much to show to the tourists.You will be able to see the beautiful chain of hills from this point. Want to stay nearby this loction? Book GMVN huts to stay and enjoy the place in real sense. No crowd, just peace and nature.

title: Mesmerizing!!
review: This is a must visit point in Lansdowne and you will not be disappointed at all. With great views all around one can get immersed in the lap of nature.

title: good view if you get clear weather
review: If sky is not clear no need to reach this point you can view same from everywhere nothing new. but if it's sunny day you can see Himalayan peaks

title: A sceinic view
review: Tip on top is the most beatifull place of landsdowne,it is realy a picturesque  place where one can enjoy the beauty  of this place

title: Highest point in Lansdowne
review: Its the highest point in lansdowne and has excellent valley view. Located in the main lansdowne cantonment area

title: Panoramic view
review: Didn't find the view extraordinary as we could see the snow peaks, so keep the weather on your side :)

title: Like a regular view
review: Tip in Top charts on the top of "must visit paces" in Lansdowne. For a small place, spots like these are a major attraction. However, for me it was an average place from where you can view the quiet town and surrounding hills. Yes sunrise view is beautiful from this spot. During the day, people crowd this place, peep down, take selfies and move on within few minutes. So, you cant think of having a quiet moment for yourself. Though the place is great for photoshoots, there is nothing extraordinary to feel great about. I enjoyed my visit as a local had brought his Lab dog and she befriended me.

title: Great Place
review: This is a place must visit when in Lansdowne, we were not lucky enough to get the view of the snowy peaks as it was  too cloudy the two times we went but still it is the highest point hence very pretty.

title: super view
review: nice view and place is also great and view fron this place himalaya view  awesoum... hight of this place is

title: Nice view!
review: Thats all, nice view! But yes, no toilets at the tourist site.

title: Amazing view
review: The view from this place was really amazing as it is the top of Lansdowne. Since it was  raining that day the weather got even more pleasant and  the view got even better as their were clouds and wind.

title: Great panoramic view of the hills
review: The view from here is great. The weather here was also very breezy as there was a little drizzle that day. This is the best view point in lansdowne and there are footpaths to take a view around this place. No eateries nearby so do carry your own food.

title: Nice Picturesque Location
review: The highest point, I think, so the temperature drops by 3 degrees as compared to town's temperature.

title: Highest peak
review: Must visit where you can view entire valley and also range of Himalaya .

title: On top of the hill
review: This place is on the top of the hill with a very nice scenic beauty. Must visit if you're going Lansdowne

title: Better to skip it
review: The view from here  is simply like the ones you can get from your resort or  any other  point  in lansdowne. No point going all the  way  to this place

title: The majestic view!
review: The whole and sole reason you visit Lansdowne is this point. Visit anytime of the day or any season, this view keeps surprising you.

title: Not a 'Must be visited' place
review: Nothing changed in last 2 years that i visited last, except for a gmvn tuck shop that has been recently opened. It took us 15 minutes to drive up to this point only to find the entire views covered by tall trees. Its probably difficult to cut down trees but if they are covering a beautiful hill view from the most popular view point in the town, i think the administration should do something about it.

title: Its hyped!
review: The view is good, but its crowded. You wont be missing anything great if you dont visit this place. Rather visit Thandi sadak

title: Beautiful Place
review: I visited with my friends and family. The place is well maintained and the view is excellent...If you are in Lansdowne. One should definitely go to this place.

title: Nice view from the top
review: One of the few places you can go while in lansdowne... if you are lucky enough to have good weather you can see the mountains picks ...

title: AWESOME VIEWS
review: we randomly dropped by this point in order to search rooms to accommodate ourselves but they were booked in advance. so we explored this site. Very nice views with chilly breeze during December. Must Visit

title: Go here for Good views and photography
review: Mind it! You will have to walk a lot to reach this point if you do not have your own vehicle. The views are amazing to look at although nothing exceptional like other hill stations. but if you have to come to Lansdowne, come here to have a good look at the hills. There is nothing else to do here.

title: Yet another point to get great views of hills
review: If it is a clear day, you can have really great views from this point. It has been recently renovated and quite easily accessible. Almost all of the hilly areas have a place like this, although, you never get enough of it!

title: 180 degree panaromic view of snow covered hills!!!
review: A place at a height with lovely views around there. you can go there while visiting church. A good place to spend time over there.

title: 180 degree picturesque view
review: If lucky, a clear sky can give you clear view of all the nine peaks... best time to visit would be in the morning.

title: Decent place for sighseeing the peaks
review: Its a pretty good walkway to sight the himalayan peaks. Thought it needs clear weather still a good place to visit

title: Beauty!
review: The place was absolutely compelling. The whole Himalayan ranges were visible from this point. The place was covered with beautiful red flowers and also had a small and old church around.

title: Good view if the weather is favourable
review: Since Lansdowne does not have much options to offer a nice woods walk to Tip in Top and back rejuvenates your mind and soul. Enjoy the nature arround while walking the pine woods. A clear weather early in the morning will call for a fantastic mountain view.

title: Must visit when in Lansdowne
review: Amongst the Top 3 things to do when in Lansdowne. You get a beautiful 360 degree view of the entire valley.

title: Awesome hills
review: This point makes pure justice to its name... It's really an amazing place to see the hills. Falling short of words to explain the grandeur.

title: The kind of views you get from airplanes!
review: We were staying just next door in very enchanting cottages. The view is magnificent but at this particular point it is scary... If you drop  your phone or camera , it is gone forever...........My legs turned to jelly even though the railings are strong. Do explore the wonderful woods and charming temples in this area. if it is at sunset there is a sunset view point close by . Unfortunately the weather did not give us this opportunity.

title: view is amazing...not very comercialized
review: view is amazing...not very commercialized.. but nothing much to see to do..free parking available..natural beauty...a govt resort

title: Nice View
review: Lansdowne is a Small Place. there are only couple of places to visit and this is one of them. it's a Sunshine Point rather a SunSet Point. Its a small place which can accommodate 10 peope at a time on the edge of a mountains to view the surrounding

title: Awesome place
review: Must say that it was a unique experience for us to see the rising sun from the root of hills. It was the first scene we saw by early in the morning.

title: As true as it can be
review: A lovely point which gives you a heart stopping view. Gives you a top of the world feel. Three specific points which have been made well complete with beautifully enclosed concrete walls for you to spend endless moments with your lived ones. Neat, accessible, inexpensive, scenic, unique and awesome in every sense.

title: Great view!
review: This place has one of the best views in Lansdowne. There is a GMVN Bungalow too nearby for the tourists who wish to stay at this scenic place. You can trek upto here from Bhulla Tal like we did or take your vehicle along. Basic tea and snack facilities are available.

title: love the driving
review: the place is really very good and the view from there are ossowm  and we love the weather. nice place to take photograph

title: Tip In Top
review: A dull place with a very less activity.There is nobody to guide .There are no signages to tell u anything about the history of the place

title: Tip n top
review: An escape to paradise. . Great vacation for couple or family or friends. . Those mountain range playing hide and seek with clear clouds are mesmerising. .

title: Nice view
review: It is good location having perfect view of Mountain. would love to visit again if get any chance in future

title: nice view point
review: Photo lovers love this place and sun set and sun rise you love it and not much crowded so you feel close to nature and relax

title: A view point
review: Nothing to boast about. Just a view point with some eatables available!!! There are many places where you can have better views.

title: Good Surrounding View
review: In the Tiny Hamlet of Lansdowne, this is the place one should not miss. Especially during Morning or evening time. Good surrounding view.

title: Good view
review: Highest point. Not much to do except click pictures. GMVN restaurant serves only Maggi, so nothing to eat at such there.

title: Over rated view point
review: This isn't anything special. If you are in lansdowne, stop by to take in the valley view. But it's over hyped as I got pretty much the same view from my hotel too.

title: Beautiful view point. Great for sunrise view
review: This place provides by far the most picturesque view of the himalayan range. On a clear day or early morning you can view Nanda Devi and the mountain peak around it.

title: Entire view of Lansdowne
review: A great view from the top.

title: useless place
review: the most useless place in the history of mountains to visit , do not waste your money going there , you will not find any thing there

title: Picturesque beauty at this place
review: Nice place to go and click pictures with family & friends. On a peak season, you may come across parking problem

title: First visit.
review: Its nice but as i am scared of heights, could not click pictures, also there is pillar on which a lot of people have scribbled names and all, which i did not like

title: Nice view point
review: It is really nice place, view points on the top. Trekking from our place to tip-in-top is also good. We have fun a lot with friends. We met some local women in our visit, they told the way. Peoples are nice also.

title: Brilliant view of range for an undistant place, only if one finds clear skies
review: One of few spots to see if one happens to visit Lansdowne. Located approximately 2 kms from main market, it is the highest point in the cantonment town. Offers 180 degree panoramic view of distant Himalayan range stretching across 250 kms from kedarnath peak up to Nanda devi. However, do not expect too much, more often than not the Himalayan panorama is obstructed by cloud cover.During my visit I was fortunate enough to experience myriad shades of sunset in backdrop of snow clad peaks.

title: Like any other point
review: Tip'n'top or Tiffin top is a point like any other point in hilly areas. Nothing exclusive. Good view of the valley and mountains.

title: only on a clear day
review: have been here twice and both times we couldn't see the mountain ranges.

title: Highest Point
review: Get there if you want to see Himalayan ranges provided it is clear skies !

title: To spot the mountain range
review: We came here looking for a view of mountains and found it, however, the day was a bit cloudy and you can only see them from tip n top. Due to tall trees you can't have a free full view of the mountain range, but can spot the entire range on a clear day.

title: Main attraction of Lansdowne, stay here rather than in the main city.
review: This place is near to the city, roughly 3Km away from Sadar Bazar. But have to take a taxi to reach this place. Average place with nice view. Just a small shop nearby. Its good if u are booking GMVN TIP n Top resthouse for your whole stay. Its better living here than living in the main city.

title: Nice view of Himalaya
review: Nice and clear view of Himalaya if you visit the place in November, 180 degree. New construction is going on so you will not find this place peaceful though

title: Felt like i am on top of the world
review: When I reached this point , I could feel the essence of the nature and it made me so attached to the view . One should visit.

title: Lot of hype
review: The actual point is flooded with water and parking costs 20 rupees. You wont spend more than 10 minutes

title: Place to feel as Top of the world
review: Tip in Top is almost the peak and edge of the mountanin. You can see the Himalayan range of mountains covered with snow at a distance. The view gives you feel of peace and calmness. SInce the next mountain range is far away, you get a clear view of long distance, which is simply amaging.

title: Beautiful place
review: You must see tip in top when you visit Lansdowne.its nice place nice valley view and well maintained.

title: Sunset point
review: Decent scenery around the tip n top point. Went with my friends to the place. Lansdowne has a couple of things to explore, tip and top being one of them apart from darwan singh museum. All in all lansdowne is just a place to chill and relax

title: Himalayan treat to the eyes.
review: This place gives you an awe-astonishing view of the himalayas.

title: average place
review: not so happening place. nice view from there. a restaurant is also there which serve good food. its small places so it is little crowded

title: Family getaway
review: Tip in Top is 2km away from Lansdowne. It offers great view of snow covered cliffs. There is parking available as well for 20 rupees which needs to be paided before.

title: New year 2017
review: Tip-in-Top has a good view of the Hills and Valley beneath. People must keep the place Clean to enjoy its Beauty.

title: Tip-n-Top point
review: Tip-n-Top is a very nice and scenic viewing point of Lansdowne. Some of views are really awesome to click and will get you satisfied with your decision to purchase DSLR.

title: Piont just for a sake of point
review: We go at the top after a lot of driving, but the view we had, was visible from many points. It was just made for the sake of making a view point, noting less

title: Valley View
review: this is the Key point for travelers but if you are a traveler who loves to go to hills you will not find it existing.

title: Nothing Much
review: Tip n Top was quite a disappointment. It's supposed to be the highest point of Lansdowne. The view of the snows is its plus point. Otherwise there is nothing much to see or do in this place.

title: Nice hangout
review: There is nothing much to do at this place if you compare it with similar points from places like Shimla or Mussorie, but if you love the feeling of fresh unpolluted air running through your hair and give it a visit, there  is  a Garhwal canteen nearby which offers delicious mouth watering pakoras and Maggi,,,worth a try.

title: View is okay, but nothing great.
review: Worth seeing once only ... hope they have kept the place cleaner.

title: nice view of nanda devi peak
review: Good location to view the himalayas. Was there recently with my family ...!! Ample parking space for vehicles.

title: Read down below
review: Not much to say about this particular place or any place in lansdowne. The real fun is driving from kotdwar to lansdowne. It will be one of the best rides you will have. If you have instincts for nature, you should take various stops and experience the beauty of nature. No crowd at all and this will be the best part of the journey. Just you and the nature.

title: Time to sit and do......................nothing
review: Visited twice to same place. Once on the day of arrival in evening and after dark enjoyed some quiet time as most of the visitors went back. It gives very good view of Nanda devi peak and valley below. Next day came again by walking from pardae ground and enjoyed in full daylight. The advantage of this place is being in Lansdowne which is not crowded with loud tourists and you can enjoy your snacks and beverage sitting in quiet with majestic view in front.

title: Ideal Location due to view
review: Well this is one of the few tourist locations you can visit during your trip to Lansdowne. The view of Hills & valley down below is great. Its a clean & unpolluted area which catches your attention.

title: Good vantage point and views
review: The view from this point is quite nice and you can see the Nanda devi, Nanda kot and Trishul parvat.

title: Good Location due to view of nanda devi peak
review: It is a very peaceful and lonely place for hangout with friends and family. The view from top is excellent.

title: Good point
review: Tip-in-top point  you can see the good view of nature and you can click the good pics.it not bad and you can enjoy at least half an hour.

title: Nice place but nothing mch to do !!
review: The place is quite and you can see the entire city from there but only then when it is not overcrowded which it is most of the times !!

title: Tip in Top Point is beautiful
review: Its a very serene peaceful place. It gives an amazing view & you can keep gazing the mountains from here. Don't forget to click some selfies with an amzing background of mountains!

title: Serene place, nice view
review: It offers a nice view and the place is quite well maintained and peaceful. One can see snow capped mountains when weather is clear, we were not so lucky though. Sunrise / sunset should also be spectacular, though not sure as we visited during early noon.

title: Just ok
review: Visited this place on 10th Oct. I thing this place can be added to your trip if you are nearby this place. It is not worth to plan especially for this place. You will not find any thing for shopping here it is just a hill top with some nice view.

title: Weekend trip
review: A lovely quiet place for you to unwind yourself. The climate is amazingly perfect. Though there is not much here to see around but if you are a nature lover then am very sure one would look love it.

title: Long walk up
review: The way up to Tip-in-Top point was good for a long walk admiring nature all the way. The weather was supportive when we did this walk.

title: The top point of lansdowne
review: An amazing view from this point. Feel the nature with a sip of tea. A nice place to take snaps and selfies

title: Top point of Lansdowne
review: There is nothing special to talk about this place. Though it is not very far from the main market of Lansdowne, we were disappointed at finding that there was not much to see or do there. The place is small and therefore cannot accommodate many visitors at a time.

title: Highest point in Lansdowne
review: Very ordinary as a tourist attraction. A distant cousin of other such places in other hill stations. Quite disappointing.

title: Excellent view
review: Tip-in-Top Point is truly tip in top. Amazing view of valleys. On one side there is a panoramic view of Lansdowne town, on the other side the winding road up is seen. Did not need to go there at sunrise as we stayed at GMVN Tip n Top which is higher and has excellent view of sunrise. Definitely worth visiting.

title: Nothing special
review: Went to this place however there is nothing like sight-seeing, you just see valley which you can see anywhere in lansdowne. There is small shop of packed snacks like Chips, Softdrinks etc.

title: Total waste of time, money and energy.
review: There is nothing to watch here, except to pay for the parking, no exceptional place and it is highly recommended to avoid this place.

title: Pleasant View
review: Visited the place towards the end of June. Got to see a panoramic view of the Garhwal Himalayan hills and valleys. This place is the most famous attraction of Lansdowne. However, the view was not very clear due to cloud cover. It is at its best during winter as suggested by the locals.

title: Nothing much to do here
review: You won't find much stuff to do here...just couple of kms away from Lansdowne market, a walking distance. You can also take your vehicle upto that place..You can visit this place but I personally didn't like it much. You can have a view of hills from here..nothing much..

title: Mesmerizing Views of Hills
review: One Gets Mesmerizing Views of Hills from here. Not Much to do ...No Shops and not much people to Disturb you.You can just stay there watching the Hills with complete Silence

title: Good for a lazy walk
review: One of the few good palces to visit in landsonwe. If ypou enjoy walk in nature, then u will definately like it.

title: good view [if you are lucky]
review: good scenic view after a long traverse...however, if the weather is cloudy, nothing can be seen, so plan accordingly

title: amazing view
review: when in this place ideal time to go is during sun rise as u get a spectacular view n the breath of fresh air which most of us are deprived off

title: Excellent place
review: Excellent place to walk to from Gandhi Market. Try to visit during the day, so that you can view the mountains far far away.

title: Regular View Point
review: What every hill station has, a view point. We were unlucky the day we went there it was raining and nothing was visible to us. Go there early morning or on a sunny day to get a good view.

title: Tip-in-Top
review: You can get beautiful sight of different small mountain range from this point. Total green everywhere. Small hamlets, villages you can see from this Tip-in-Top Point.

title: Lansdowne trip
review: Nice walk and view from there. Have masala maggi at the restaurant. don't go by car, enjoy the walk.

title: Nice scenic views of Lansdwone
review: Just a couple of miles from the Lansdowne main market. A nice place to visit for lovely views and peace of mind!!!

title: Good Place to see Vally View
review: Lansdown has limited options visit and this one is certainly worth to visit. As name says its Top of Lansdown area and gives a nice view of vally. Place is well maintained and road to approch this point is nice, thanks to Lansdown cantonment Board ( LCB) for this.

title: Natural view in tip n top
review: Tip n top is a highest place in lansdown.

title: nice view
review: Must visit forlalansdowne visitors. you can have vally view from here and can click many beautiful photo graph.

title: beautiful
review: lovely view. however we were staying at the gmvn guesthouse right above the pathway to the viewpoint so we got the glorious view all the time.

title: Average place to visit .. Costly Food joint
review: It is pretty average place or attraction in town.. It only has one corner where you can see Roads towards Lansdowne else there is nothing worth visit.

title: Amazing views
review: It is the top most point and comes with gorgeous views of the surrounding hills and valleys. One can have a picnic at this point with family and friends.

title: Small Place with beautiful View
review: Its a small place with a best view of the hills, good place of taking pics. There was not rush even on peak season. You have to park your car and walk around 100 meters to reach the point.

title: Awesome View Point!
review: Amazing trip and awesome view from there. We stayed there approx 3 hr and we enjoyed a lot. Very calm and peaceful place, away from hustle and bustle of daily city life

title: Nice view, especially after the rains, on a clear day,visited in mid June 2016.
review: A little further away from the Bhulla Tal, you can stop at the St. Mary's Church and then head towards the Tip in Top Point. You can feel the cool , fresh mountain breeze blowing through your hair, which really leaves you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

title: Tip and TOP
review: Awesome View at sunset time.but maximum time is cloudy. but we are lucky 2nd days gooing this place. but log kehte hai sam ko leopard nikal ta hai..

title: Good View
review: Nice place. From here you can see a major part of the valley and on clear days you can see the snow peaks as well.

title: Good spot to take pictures.
review: Situated on a hill top, this place offers wide views of the valley and is an ideal spot to take pictures. Couples must visit this place.

title: Tiffin top
review: We really had a good time there.

title: view
review: nice place to visit in summer and get an escape from the summer heat.

title: Sunrise point
review: A very nice view and a must visit point in Lansdonw cantt. go relax and enjoy a awesome sunrise from this place

title: Nice place
review: The only Hill spot in this Hill station. We took trek from bhula tal to here. Was good experience. You can also trek to a temple above this point but difficult to reach. Great view of the mountain

title: A nice little place in the Lansdowne
review: A small hillock which was converted into a natural tourist attraction now a days have been totally covered in cement and made into a tourist spot., while this place for a local like me had immense charm when it was not touched by so called modernity, It still hold on its own owing to the special place where you can watch over Himalayan range and the small town of Jehrikhal. A good place to sit and enjoy the music of nature and sight sounds of the flora an fauna if you care to listen.

title: Nice place
review: Reached there after some struggle as google map confused us a bit. Then with the help of a military officer, reached the place. Our main intention was to have lunch at GMVN Tip & Top resort.

title: Scenic and perfect for pics
review: Tip In Top Point in Lansdowne is a pretty place which can get you good memories as your best pictures. Its just out of a postcard with winding roads down the hill with tall trees. Children may find this spot boring as there is nothing much to see but adults will appreciate the beauty of nature for sure.

title: Great View!
review: A quiet place to sit and enjoy the valley view. On a clear sunny day, you can see the snow cliffed mountains.

title: Highest point in Lansdowne
review: This is the highest point in Lansdowne with awesome views. Given the limited number of sigh seeing places in Lansdowne & the fact that all lie on the same road, you can visit it.

title: Valley view point
review: It is a valley view point. Place is ok, one can feel the mountain peak there. Not comfortable in sun heat. Best when clouds  are there.

title: Good place
review: A small point at the highest of Lansdowne where you can see whole Lansdowne, take beautiful selfies.enjoy nature.

title: A good walk
review: The tallest point in landsdowne..nice place to watch sunrise & sunset..there could be better signage on road helping people who are walking..nevertheless the view is breathtaking..cleanly maintained..has a little shop from where eatables available...the entire place in a birds eye view is what it is all about ..parking for 2 hrs is 20 Rs.

title: Place for scenic view
review: This is situated in Lansdowne cantonment area. This is actually made on the corner of a mountain peak where you can enjoy beautiful views and take a lot of pictures. At this time there were hardly any nature views because whole forest was burning and everywhere you could only see smoke. This place has a small snack outlet and there is no entry fee or parking fee.

title: Hill View
review: If anyone visit, they must visit Tip N Top point for hill view and feel the moment and enjoy the moment.

title: Nice viewing in lansdowne
review: Nice sightseeing point in lansdowne, you get great view of lansdowne.  Food and water available in this place,  parking  available.  Nice walks possible......

title: Killer View of Nature.
review: Killer View of Nature, treat for your eyes. Walking distance from Lansdowne Main market. Just go and get some click.

title: Beautiful View
review: The place give you valley view and colours of greens. Wait for place to be vacated by Selfie mania people.

title: Top View
review: Nice place to see top view of Hill range. Excellent place to capture breathtaking views. It is better to visit this place on Sunny bright day for better views

title: Tip n Top
review: Good Place with a awesome view of the hills and surrounding valleys. Put your trekking shoes on and enjoy.

title: Place to enjoy nature and photo shoot
review: If you are in Lansdowne, you cannot miss this place. The way is full of nature.

title: Over hype of this place !
review: A very normal place to be at Lansdowne ! Though its on the top as has a great view and is peaceful and calm, but I feel the view generally gets blocked by the presence of too much of fog during times of rains and unclear weather ! We could barely see anything and later on we got to know that it is a very general thing for others for being unable to catch a glimpse of the entire mountains and valley as fog is a routine thing over there ! Poor maintenance of the area was felt as many people had scribbled their names on the walls and stones nearby ! Should definitely take create some more attraction of or interest for other tourists  !

title: Perfect for sunrise and sunset!
review: A must visit place in Lansdowne for amazing sunset and sunrise views, lovely place if the weather is cool.

title: Nothing except a great view
review: Nothing except a great view, and amount of time spent and travelling we do go get there is too much. So not worth it.

title: Nice spot
review: A good place to have a look of the greenery but gets crowded. There are too many tourists flocking the place that takes the serenity away

title: Average place to visit
review: No other plus point except you have a good view from this point but as there are very less options in Lansdowne you have no choice.

title: Cool and Breezy
review: This is a nice point to click pics. It has a nice view. Cool place to walk around. It has a beautiful GMVN resort with very nice cottages.

title: Not a lot of things to do!!
review: It is a pretty decent place where you can sit and enjoy the nature. If you are looking for activities then this not the place.

title: one of the tourist spot
review: decent. u can walk to both the churches from here. nothing out of the box about tip in top. bhulla taal is also near by.

title: Amazing views
review: Stayed at GMVN Tip n top hence enjoyed the amazing views from this point. Sunrise on a clear day is worth watching.

title: good view but over crowded
review: I got there in off season but still the place was crowded like hell. At last when i set to click some pictures i found that the view was okay from there. There are better view from elsewhere places on the way to this point...an okay okay experience,

title: Hill Top Point
review: One of the few places to visit in Lansdowne, so a must visit. Nothing much is there but it is the top most point in lansdowne.

title: Snow View or Sunset View Point lies on the way to Tiffin
review: t a distance of 2.5 km from Lansdowne Market, Tip-In-Top also known as Tiffin Top is situated in the ridge near St. Mary's Church in Lansdowne. This is a popular spot among tourists visiting Lansdowne.

title: Good view
review: This place gives a good view. Reach the top after a short climb. There is nothing much to do here except click a few photos.

title: morning walk
review: the place is approx. 3-3.5 km from the main market.Walking in the early morning is great rejuvenating experience.

title: Cool breeze and the blue skies
review: Only 2 hours from Kotdwar, Lansdowne is such a quiet and tranquil hill station that you would want to sit and never look anywhere. Tip-n-top point has been maintained well by the government. You can sit back, relax and enjoy. They have beautiful wooden cottage houses to stay near-by, other major attractions are also within a distance of 5-10 mins.

title: Wow views
review: Went with my family, had a great time.The vies were spectacular and the place is calm and quite.A must visit place if u want to have some great views.

title: A refreshing experience
review: It offers a spectacular view of the valley and proves to be an amazing place for some good pictures. The place is quite clean and one can sit back, relax and enjoy.

title: Wonderful views !
review: The highest point in Lansdowne for a good view and especially , if someone staying in GMVN. The GMVN property is wonderful here though bit expensive.

title: balcony that opens to breath-taking view
review: Somewhere in between of those environmental talks we noticed that we were just two wandering around. Only the hills were there to listen our talks and laughs and whisper their magic to our ears. Situated amidst the thick oaks and pine trees is the St John church but it was close too, as we were too early. So, we walk past it hoping that it will be open when we come back from the Top.

title: Best view from Landowne
review: On a clear day, one can view badrinath from this hill top. It has a breathtaking view and a heaven for photography enthusiasts. A must if you're in Lansdowne

title: Good view and fresh air but good for short visit
review: When you reach this place as a regular visitor, you enjoy the height of Lansdowne. However, I will recommend staying here at the GMVN in case you can get a booking. The place will look marvelous in the evening. Otherwise if you are there for a short visit, you will typically be bored by 10 minutes.There is a restaurant run by GMVN round the corner.

title: Mesmerizing views
review: Must be highest point of Lansdowne. It has amazing view of Hills and Valley with lovely cool breeze. Although there aren't any tourist facility here, the views make up for it. The way to the top itself very quite and full of jungle flora n fauna with aromatic freshness in the air. Must visit place if in Lansdowne.

title: Good quite place on hills
review: It was a nice n clam place ,, not so much of rush ,, so I liked it. It gives a good overview of city.

title: Sunset point
review: This place offers a great view of the hill station .One must go here to watch the sunset . I guess it doesn't open that early for sunrise .

title: Tip of the top
review: This is a popular view point of the town Lansdowne similar to what you find all hill stations. However it is worth visiting this place once. Many restaurants are coming up in the vicinity.

title: Average View Point of Lansdowne
review: If you are visiting lansdowne you can visit this place for the selfies and pics, its the same place which is present at all the hill stations, but as there is nothing to do much in the city so one can visit this place and spend sometime taking pictures.

title: Not so special
review: I(t was like any other viewpoint in hill stations. It was quite warm - we were more interested in buying a water bottle from the shop. Because of the haze, could not see the peaks clearly. But yes, the vegetation is worth seeing. Flowering trees - the kind that are very expensive in the plains were growing wild there.

title: Panoramic view from this spot!
review: One gets a good panoramic view of the mountains from this spot. Definitely seems over hyped as not much to see around in Landsdowne, however we found another good spot 1-2 kms ahead to view the sunset. If I remember correctly this spot is not wheelchair friendly and the steps were pretty high and uneven.

title: amazing view
review: view is amazing. worth visit. not as crowded as other top views in other hill stations are. picturesque

title: Best view of Lansdowne
review: I had the privilege to go there both in day & night ... though the day view is fabulous .. nothing in Lansdowne is more romantic than night view from Tip&Top point

title: Need to go there VERY early morning (6 AM - 7 AM)
review: Quick Facts:

title: Tip in Top point, Lansdowne.
review: Part of the standard day tour package, a view point common to most hill-stations. Nice place for sitting out.

title: breathtaking views
review: here you can take pictures & relax for sometimes. gives excellent views of the valley. Must visit place in lansdowne

title: Nice & clean, well maintained lovely view point
review: A must visit if in Lansdowne. The place is maintained by Garhwal Rifles. It is very clean and offers beautiful views of the valley beneath. The ramp is not steep..just walk few steps and you are at the look out point. Evenings are beautiful. The place is surrounded by beautiful trees

title: Amazing View Of the valley and mountains and greenary From Tip in Top point
review: Amazing View Of the valley and mountains and greenary From Tip in Top point.Must Visit for those who love nature and photographers delight.Also it is one of the best attractions of Lansdowne.Though there is not much thing to do there in tip in top but you can just walk around breathe fresh air and spend some quality time with family and friends amidst this beautiful location.

title: Nice views
review: This is at a peak definitely giving beautiful views. Was nice peaceful and calm. Was nothing much around, but we sat and enjoyed some peaceful time there.

title: OK OK
review: You can see much better views while driving on any road in Lansdowne, ok place to go if you don't have much to do and want to spend 30-40 odd minutes with lots of people and lots of monkeys, you might see few people behaving like monkeys here, that's for sure ;)

title: A silent mesmerizing view
review: Lansdowne is no doubt the best place to be if you want to get closer to nature. And this spot happens to be the cherry on top of your cake. The view cannot be described in words. The Himalayas can be seen but one has to be lucky enough to get the view early morning or during sunset.

title: nice view
review: Should visit, will not be disappointed, good view from top of cliff, can see the entire mountain range from top

title: Nice View..
review: This point is like any other hill station.

title: Excellent scenic view
review: this place is full of scenic view, nice gardens and open space to play around, they also have beautiful huts to stay

title: The vantage point
review: Easily the best view from Lansdowne.... what you see is miles and miles of greenery and expanses.. one feels so alone and yet so enriched while being there. Dotted below are greenlands... and the wind is intoxicatingly cool.

title: Its a ice place to look at if you like nature
review: If you like nature then its a muust visit place. but lansdowne is a place where you get this kind of sight at many places... so go ahead have a look you dont have much to explore at this place as its very small and cozy hill station

title: Average
review: Good views of the Valley from the point but these sightseeing points are very common on every hill station,nothing new & intresting

title: Good view
review: It's at a higher altitude so one would find clouds! The hills give a fantastic view too. But during rainy days, hardly anything is visible. It becomes over clouded.

title: Good Place
review: tWe went to lansdowne for relaxing.we stayed in hotel mayur for 2 night. Our purpose for relaxing is fulfilled. No tension for bedtea, lunch, dinner & chaat is very good. This is the only veg restaurent in town. Rooms are very good moreover owners are very cooperative. This is the only AC hotel in lansdowne. Overall stay in this hotel is excellant.

title: Chilling point
review: This point offers you the best view of Himalayas ,you can take a lot of pictures /selfies here.you will feel the cold wind blowing here touching your body and recharging your body cells.

title: Nice view point
review: Nice view point. A bit crowded with people taking selfies/groupies.

title: Good view point
review: This is the highest point at Lansdowne and one can have a spectacular view of mighty Himalayas. This place also has GMVN hotel also.  It is better to visit this place early to get a clear view and by noon or evening it get covered by cloud.

title: Full View of Valley
review: When you reach here, you could feel to be at the top of Lansdown, but also of near by mountains. One should be lucky to be in the right time of season to clear the clear view of the full clear of the mountains.

title: Offers good view
review: This place offers very good view of the town below and the valley. One can take nice shots from here.

title: Walk around and soak in the ambience
review: The real joy of visiting Lansdowne is not this point, or any point in particular. It is the joy of being in the hills & the forests, close to nature. We visited Tip-in-Top point (referred to in books as Tiffin Top point) in the morning - there were hardly any people there, and the forests all around were buzzing with birds and insects and the sounds of nature. On a clear day, I am told you can see snow-clad peaks in the distance - we didn't have that luck. It is around a 30 minute walk from Lansdowne market - we paid Rs. 300 for a one-way cab from Gumkhal.

title: Amazing beautiful view from this point...near to Delhi
review: This is one point which is very beautiful and a hill station near to Delhi. This place is very peaceful and less crowded. I will recommend this place only those people who want peace and nature.

title: Good view
review: A short drive from the town's market area; excellent for a view of the hills and valleys beyond. A very short walk from the parking area.

title: Super View
review: Amazing Experience. This is one point which is very beautiful and a hill station near to Delhi. This place is very peaceful and less crowded.

title: Trip
review: Its a very nice point from where d himalaya ranges can be seen. Its a very nice view from the hill top. Must visit places in lansdowne.

title: Highest view point
review: This will definitely will give you breath taking views of the lansdwone but unfortunately when we went it was foggy and due to then we didn't had good visibility.

title: Excellent View
review: This is one of the highest point in lansdowne, and definitely need a visit if u r going to lansdowne. U can click good photos here and view is awesome.

title: Awesome Place
review: You need to do a little bit trekking to reach to Tip-in-Top point (only if you want to). If you don't want to walk, road is well connected to the town area. It's worth walking there. Awesome place, amazing weather (mostly windy). Lansdowne is a must go place if you need to take a break and do nothing but relax :)

title: Top location in Lansdowne
review: By far the best place in lansdowne... on a clear day it gives a magnificent view of the snow clad mountains

title: Good View Point
review: You don't have much to see in Lansdowne. So just go there and spend sometime on this viewpoint. You will feel refreshed and relaxed looking at sunrise or sunset. Nice place for couples as well.

title: Must visit for a great view
review: Lansdowne is less popular hill station in north India and an excellent place if you are peace lover. Just relax and enjoy the natural beauty. Tip-In-Top is a point where you can get the excellent view of snow covered Himalayan ranges. If you are lucky, you will see a clear view. I went there in the mid of Feb around 11am and got to see a great clear view. If you are an expert driver, you can drive up to the top. The place has a parking space and a canteen at Tip-In-Top. There is a GMVN hotel just at Tip-In-Top. Book your stay in this hotel if you want to see sunrise/sunset here.

title: One of the few places to visit
review: One of few place specified as "place to visit" in Lansdowne. Basically if someone plans to go to Lansdowne, they should plan to enjoy the peaceful and quiet ambience surrounding the city overall rather then try to cover the visit points. Lansdowne is still untouched by commercialisation and very few places in India where you can enjoy the nature in its true form which is not the case in going to more famous place like Nainital and Mussorrie. So just do nothing and soak in the morning sun enjoying your leisurely breakfast listening to nature's music is the best way to enjoy here. For a change you can go to Tip n Top and/or other few  places.

title: Location is Good
review: It was a nice experience visiting this place. Location & View are good, A Peaceful place in the month of September ( I visited in Sept)

title: WoW place to visit
review: Excellent place for nature lovers and have view of great range of himalayas, splended and vast.......

title: A well-maintained spot with a decent view of snow-covered mountains
review: It is a well-maintained place and provides a good view of snow-covered mountains and valleys. Worth a visit .

title: beauty beyond explanation
review: i really loved this place would have been much better if not foggy..you can see snow covered Himalayas...deep valleys..very beautiful and awsome

title: Breathtaking view of Shivalik Hills
review: Lansdowne is one of the most famous travel destinations of Garhwal region of Uttarakhand. overall trip to lansdowne was memorable  and exciting. Tip N top point is a nice view point where you can find awesome views of Himalayas. snow covered mountains, and relaxing environment. the spot is well managed. its  a  photography point not much to do here  a good camera is must to capture the beauty of surrounding hills, also two other points near Tip-in-Top are St. Joseph`s Church and St. Mary`s church one of the oldest church  founded in 1887 and developed by the British. now its care taken by Army where  a short documentary also shown to visitors about History of Garhwal Regiment and their relation with Lansdown. one  GNVM Tourist house with canteen facility is also present near tip-in top for which booking can be made through GMVNL website.

title: snow peak
review: A place to fantasize and adore himalayas. Awesome view. Be careful of the cliff. hold hands and enjoy

title: Excellent and Breathtaking  views of snow covered hills
review: Lansdowne is place only for nature lovers. From here you will find fantastic and awesome view of Himalayas. Please be little careful while clicking photos as there are no barriers and lots of cliff are there and valley is deep!! It is a photography point where you should get yourself clicked in different poses. You can spend around one hour at this place

title: A must visit place
review: This is a very good spot for watching an excellent sunrise view. One has to get up early in the morning to get the best view. We reached a little late but still could get a decent view.It is about 3 Kms from the main Bazar and one can walk to the place if fit enough. There is nice road up to the point if one wants to go by car.

title: Excellent and Breathtaking views of Lansdowne
review: Tip in Top very good point for watching an excellent sunrise view,mountains and lansdowne natural beauty.

title: Jitendra @ TIP and TOP
review: The View was amazing ..jaw dropping .far in the blue sky ..a thin layer of snow on Himalayan range was beautiful

title: Majestic view
review: from fairydale its about 3 km if interested walk quitely and spend some time, refreshing and soaking.

title: Nice Quiet Place
review: Away from crowd very peaceful place. Not much to do but you can enjoy trekking, view of himalayan range is breath taking. You can also book hotels to stay at night.

title: Good for clicking photos!
review: This was our second trip to "Tiffin-Top" as it is mentioned at the site. One can spend half an hour or so to get a glimpse of the nearby mountains as it is the highest point of Lansdowne.

title: Highest point in Lansdowne
review: This tourist location offers a good 360 view of the mountain ranges and the Himalayas in the distance. The authorities have developed the place well and installed benches/huts for visitors to relax, unwind, enjoy the sun and the views. Do stop by for a gorgeous view of the mountains and valleys.

title: Decent View
review: Since been to most of the places in Uttarakhand, I would rate the view from here is just decent. The snow-peaked mountains are far way. For eg. from Kausani, you get a better view.

title: Good point to get the Himalaya view
review: Good place to take some pics, you can get a good view of the Himalayas from this location. It was very calm and only a family was there other than us. So less populated this place. You can sit and relax here. No cafe at this location was open. So get some eatery things if you want to hang out here for more time

title: Highest but not the best
review: The road to Tip-n-top is very steep. but there is nothing to see much except taking a selfie and clicking some picture of the valley

title: Best Place to View Himalayas
review: In Lansdowne there are many places where you can see the great Himalayas but close to the GMVN huts this site is a good place to view the magnificent Great Himalayan ranges. There is an unmanned parking plus a small shop nearby where you can get eatables and cold drinks. This place is close to St Mary's Church and there is a temple nearby.

title: Breathtaking
review: The views from this place is simply amazing. you can stand here for hours n hours and not get tired, enjoy the fresh air

title: A view of entire lansdowne from one point !!
review: You can just enjoy the whole place by standing at one point..Dont exoect too much from this place..Just a natural beauty !!

title: Excellent view
review: This place is overlooks the valley and is the highest point in Lansdowne..great scenery and a place to take selfies....

title: Awe-inspiring view!
review: Just see & enjoy nature. After taking pics, enjoy some snacks at the the restaurant in midst of floating clouds. Simply adorable, moreso with your friends! dslr is a must.

title: Just one point from where you can see good view
review: This place has only one point from where you can see some good view of near by places, common for all hill stations.

title: Awesome view
review: Property not maintained;wish we could fine people for littering The view is nice. There is also a small eating place on top . GVMN accomodation is next to Tip in top

title: A nice view from the top most point in Lansdowne
review: Can be visited while in Lansdowne to get some great views of the hills and mountains on a clear day .

title: Just a hill top with a nice view of Himalayas
review: One of the most talked about tourist attraction in Lansdowne. Nothing great actually. The place gets overcrowded as it is visited by everyone who comes to Lansdowne. Not maintained properly. Heaps of garbage here and there spoil the view. No public amenities or eating joints nearby. It is actually a hill top where you can get some good pics clicked if you get a chance.

title: Top of Lansdowne
review: Similar to its name, this place is on top of a mountain in Lansdowne (~1700 m). You can see nearby valleys and cantonment and a GMVN resort. It is a must visit in days of clear sun.

title: you can see beautiful ranges from tip n top
review: From this sightseeing point you can see beautiful himalayan ranges and you can also see snow capped mountain ranges of badrinath and on tipn top there are beautiful cottages of G.M.V.N ( garhwaal mandal vikas nigam) and there is also a small canteen of g.m.v.n where you can enjoy the snacks sit eat and relax.

title: beautiful valley view
review: its just beautiful from here you can see very beautiful chamoli ranges. and there is a beautiful garden also where you kids enjoy to play cricket

title: Beautiful place for secluded weekend.
review: We a party of 11 stayed at Tip-in-Top resort managed by GMVN. This is situated at the highest point of Lansdowne and has beautiful surroundings. We took three deluxe double bedroom and one super deluxe (with two double bedrooms) cottages. The double bedroom cottages were ok where as super deluxe was a very good one. The room service was efficient and food was superb. Here nothing is included in room charges as in most of places the breakfast is included in the room charges. We very much enjoyed our stay at this place.

title: Awesome Sunrise
review: Wonderful sunrise from this point. Its  bit away towards lansdowne from the palce we stayed, but the hardship is worth it

title: Top point
review: This place is the top most point of Lansdowne where you can take some snaps with your I saw some of the guys were trying to do little extra with the security bars but don't do that because there is no any cost of life

title: Wonderful view of the mountains!!
review: A selfie at this place is a must!!! situated at the hill cliff, and on a sunny day, you get a very beautiful view of the valley.

title: Same as it's in every hill station.
review: It's nice view but same view is available from many places .. even from hotels. though, not a bad place to visit.

title: beautiful
review: Its beautiful place to see the mountains of garhwal region . good parking space . Many restaurants are nearby tip n top point.

title: Awesome view
review: This the highest point to view entire city.

title: Tip in Top ?
review: This point provides wonderful view of city valley. Under the sunshine city looks like a pearl. It offers various view points, which are quite scenic and beautiful. It hosts a Govt guest house as well.

title: High at Tip-in-TOP point
review: Highest point in LandsDowne. You will enjoy the panoramic view of the valley and the other side can see snow peaks of Great Himalaya. If no clouds can see the beautiful Chaukambha snow top, Badrinath peaks etc shine in Sun light.

title: Nothing much.
review: Nothing Much. all you can see is the Himalyan range from this point. Its a photography point. If you have excess time then you can visit this place.

title: Good spot
review: Its a good spot for a panoramic view. The drive in is cute and the cottages are nearby. Overall a good spot for a few clicks

title: Full view of the valley
review: It is a very short drive from Darwan Singh museum.  The road leads to the hill top and walk up to the rock jutting above the valley.  You can see the whole valley below and winding roads.  There are odd looking lizards too (see photo)

title: Nice view
review: Good place to visit. Really nice view from the top most height of the hill. Cleanliness is also maintained in this area. Must visit place if you are visiting Landsdowne.

title: Spectacular view of the Mountain ranges
review: What a fantastic view atop this beautiful mountain. A spectacular view of the mountain range as far as Kanchenjunga....Its worth a visit and spending some quiet time here

title: ok ok... great view of city
review: its a place from where you can get a bird eye view of the surroundings. you can sit and enjoy the cool breeze.

title: Beautiful view point
review: Its the highest point in Lansedowne..You can view sunrise here. We were not lucky enough as it was cloudy all over.

title: A Bird's Eye View of Lansdowne - Time for few clicks and selfie
review: The point which gives you the bird's eye view of Lansdowne. Great view. You can catch sunrise and sunset if no clouds. U Can definitely catch it if u stay at the huts on the top of the hill. A mandatory place for few clicks with your dear ones. A selfie is must at this place.

title: Amazing view
review: One of the best point in Lansdowne. You can see the long range of mountains from this point. Must go place.

title: Ok type
review: It took us 15 minutes to drive up to this point only to find the entire views covered by tall trees. Its probably difficult to cut down trees but if they are covering a beautiful hill view from the most popular view point in the town, i think the administration should do something about it.

title: Good walk
review: A nice walk from the market to the point, with a church in between  with a video on the local regiment's contribution to different wars.

title: great view silent enviorment
review: give 4 star rating just because of  beautiful landscape  and its at the top of the mountain. good for people who love to stay alone and calm enviorment.

title: Awesome Point
review: This place is best place in whole lansdowne with cool breeze and feel of clouds. One can take a view for whole valley from this place. Perfect place for photography.

title: Amazing view
review: Good place to see Himalayan range sparking with sun light. romantic and beautiful place. Selfi and photographic place.

title: Average Place
review: Average place. Enjoy the trekking and go there walking. Nothing much to do, simply enjoy the nature and click few photos. Just an average place.

title: Beautiful hills area
review: One of the best experience with these kind of the place secially in the hills area i loved it a lot with my self car drive..

title: The Tip-in-Top or something point! :)
review: Nice place to view the hills and valleys around from Landsdowne.Good and well maintained. Parking may be a problem on busy days.

title: Surreal sunset
review: Tip-in-Top Point @lansdowne is a great sunset view point. We stopped there for around ~30 mins and sunset view was really surreal.

title: Heights!!1
review: Provides a beautiful view of the town and the mountain ranges a calm place to spend lot of time and a beautiful sky view in the night

title: Good, but not great!
review: Tip N Top point is a much hyped viewpoint in Lansdowne.. And thats the truth! Coz if you're not there to just take pictures, you can easily catch a hiking trail and soon find yourself at the top of a hill, from where the view is so breathtaking, that you can simply stand there and forget everything!

title: Tip in Top Visit
review: This location is a superb one. But to enjoy this location to the best possible extent one needs to stay in gmvn tip n top hotel which is just above this point. Enjoy your time here in full moonlight.. or early in morning when it's not crowded. You will have memories of life time with your special one or friends... If you opt to stay at gmvn tip n top then be prepared to have the most relaxing times of your life in the lap of nature with delicious yet simple food at doorstep of your room whenever you wish.

title: Better views of the valley all around
review: Not a great view, I would say, in this season. May be clearer skies will reveal snow clad Chaukhamba Peak of Himalayas.

title: Mesmerising weather.
review: Visited last weekend.divinely peaceful.lots of clouds and a very scenic valley view from this point.I still feel peace and calm when think of this place.

title: Great Sceneric Place
review: Probably one of the highest point in Lansdowne. Great view of mountains and just a step away from Hotel Tip in Top

title: waste of time in Tip-in-Top
review: its a well known site in lansdowne but there is nothing to do only a photo location which is not even better then locations on the way to lansdowne. If you were to take my advice dont even waste your time going there.

title: Gives a complete view of valley
review: Situated at Army cantt area hence its well maintained. weather was very pleasant when we visited this place hence enjoyed a lot.

title: nice view
review: its a point from where u can see a very nice view of mountains. quiet place. near to town. nothing much to do except good view.

title: Tip n Top view is weather dependant
review: View is not that much good. It must be better if weather is a little pleasant , when sun is not at its peak.

title: A Magnificent View of the Garhwal Hills
review: Tip-in-Top point is a hill top affording a great view of the valleys around Lansdowne. The place is connected by a winding road from Lansdowne but is excellent trekking destination which can be reached through the hill tracks from Lansdowne. There is a nice restaurant offering snacks, tea/ coffee and cold drinks. A resort run by the Government Tourist Agency is there and has accommodation in pine cottages fitted with the the modern facilities.

title: A good spot for a valley view.....
